type CompositeDataBoundControl = class inherit DataBoundControl interface INamingContainer

summary.span: 表示由其他服务器控件组成的表格格式数据绑定控件的基类。

span.span: Represents the base class for a tabular data-bound control that is composed of other server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用作复合的服务器控件从数据源绑定到数据类的基类。The class serves as the base class for a composite server control that binds to data from a data source. 复合服务器控件是从其他服务器控件的组合生成一个控件。A composite server control is a control that is built from a combination of other server controls. 页面开发人员不要使用类直接; 相反，它们使用从此类派生的控件。Page developers do not use the class directly; instead, they use controls that derive from this class. 复合数据绑定控件的示例包括， ，和控件。Examples of composite data-bound controls include the , , and controls. 继承的类控件必须重写方法来创建控件层次结构。Classes that inherit from the control must override the method to create the control hierarchy. 若要访问的数据绑定复合控件的子控件，请使用集合。To access the child controls of a composite data-bound control, use the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建自定义的复合数据绑定控件用于显示表中的数据源的值。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom composite data-bound control that displays the values of a data source in a table. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#2)]

span.para: 继承自类，必须重写以下成员： 。
When you inherit from the class, you must override the following member: .

summary.span: 获取复合数据绑定控件内的子控件的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the child controls within the composite data-bound control.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示复合数据绑定控件内的子控件。

span.span: A that represents the child controls within the composite data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定复合控件是一个或多个服务器控件的组合。A composite data-bound control is a combination of one or more server controls. 使用属性来管理这些子控件。Use the property to manage these child controls. 您可以添加、 删除或循环访问集合中的服务器控件。You can add, remove, or iterate through the server controls in the collection.

summary.span: 创建用于呈现复合数据绑定控件的控件层次结构。

span.span: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render a composite data-bound control.

summary.span: 基于存储在视图状态中的值创建用来呈现复合数据绑定控件的控件层次结构。

span.span: Creates the control hierarchy that is used to render a composite data-bound control based on the values that are stored in view state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由派生的类使用一个帮助器方法类来创建数据绑定复合控件的控件层次结构。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to create the control hierarchy for a composite data-bound control. 此方法的重载创建基于从视图状态，而不是直接从数据源的值的控件层次结构。This overload of the method creates the control hierarchy based on values from view state, rather than directly from the data source.

summary.span: 当在抽象类中重写时，基于指定数据源中的值创建用来呈现复合数据绑定控件的控件层次结构。

span.span: When overridden in an abstract class, creates the control hierarchy that is used to render the composite data-bound control based on the values from the specified data source.

returns.span: 由 创建的项的数量。

span.span: The number of items created by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由派生的类使用一个帮助器方法类来创建数据绑定复合控件的控件层次结构。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to create the control hierarchy for a composite data-bound control. 当扩展类，必须重写方法来创建你自己的控件层次结构。When extending the class, you must override the method to create your own control hierarchy. 创建复合控件的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 ASP.NET 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef)。For more information on creating a composite control, see [Developing Custom ASP.NET Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbe26c16-cff4-4089-b3dd-877411f0c0ef). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写自定义控件创建控件层次结构中的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom control to create the control hierarchy. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/CS/idataitemcontainersample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer_1/VB/idataitemcontainersample.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置为了删除数据要调用的方法的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the method to call in order to delete data.
The name of the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定系列教程，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是由派生的类使用一个帮助器方法类，以将数据从数据源绑定到复合数据绑定控件。The method is a helper method that is used by classes that derive from the class to bind the data from the data source to the composite data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性会导致模型绑定要用作数据绑定方法。Setting this property causes model binding to be used as the data-binding method. 在 Web 窗体中使用模型绑定系列教程，请参阅[模型绑定和 Web 窗体](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data)。For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](/aspnet/web-forms/overview/presenting-and-managing-data/model-binding/retrieving-data).
